sources.description: In order to boost "troop morale" after a failed attack on German positions, an ambitious French general had three innocent front-line soldiers executed during World War I. This is a ruthless indictment of the crimes of war and the military's thirst for glory.

metadata.Plot: The futility and irony of the war in the trenches in WWI is shown as a unit commander in the French army must deal with the mutiny of his men and a glory-seeking general after part of his force falls back under fire in an impossible attack.
metadata.Writer: Stanley Kubrick, Calder Willingham, Jim Thompson
metadata.Actors: Kirk Douglas, Ralph Meeker, Adolphe Menjou
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award5 wins & 3 nominations total
